channel.title: Golden Plains Baptist Church - Special Services
channel.itunes:subtitle: Summer Campmeeting, Fall Revival, Teen Lightning
channel.itunes:author: Various Independent Baptist Preachers
channel.itunes:summary: Sermon Audio from special meetings at Golden Plains Baptist Church, An old fashioned, Bible believing, fundamental, independent Baptist church, where you will hear the truth of the gospel of Jesus Christ, and be challenged to obedience to God.
channel.description: Preaching of the word of God by Various Preachers at Special Events held at Golden Plains Baptist Church

image.title: Through His Word, with Pastor Rob Carlson
